sham.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone or something that is not what they are claimed to be – used to show disapproval
sham.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The elections were a complete sham.
sham.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: when someone tries to make something or someone seem better than they really are
sham.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: It all turned out to be sham and hypocrisy.
sham.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a cover for a pillow, especially one used for decoration
sham.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: made to appear real in order to deceive people
sham.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to pretend to be upset, ill etc to gain sympathy or an advantage
sham.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: She’s not ill, she’s only shamming.
